Status: Lvl 1 Fighter | HP: 12/12 | XP: 0/300 | Gold: 10gp","resources":"HD: 1/1 | Second Wind: 1/1 | Exhaustion: 0","narrative":"You awaken on cold stone, the echo of your own breathing filling a chamber carved from ancient rock.
